title: Physician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: The initial interview was a telephone interview with the director of HR. This was followed by an in person interview with the president of the physician group. I then met with some of the physicians, and a formal offer was made shortly after.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in our organization?

title: Registered Nurse - Operating Room Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Worcester, MA) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions:
I had 2 interviews. The first was with the manager and educator as well as HR. The second was with peers. 
I then received a call a few days later from HR offering me the job but the pay is awful so I am waiting to see if they can at least give me what I’m making now which is $4 more than what they offered me.
Interview Questions: How much am I currently making? The pay rate is below average.

title: RN Float Pool Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: I was contacting by the Hiring Manager directly, and she scheduled an interview with me.  As a part of the interview, she gave me a tour of the units that I would be working on as a Float.  I then met with Human Resources.
Interview Questions: Describe a situation in which you felt you made a positive difference to the patient's experience.

title: Scheduling Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied and it took about three weeks for them to contact me and I scheduled one interview, and everything went well (everyone I've met has been so helpful and sweet). I went to 2 observations and one more interview before they made an offer. Overall pleasant experience, just took a while.
Interview Questions: Why do you want the job?

title: Security Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Manager in person interview
HR in person interview.
Both were very simple, more gauged at feeling out the personality of new employees. MRMC is very good about having employees that work well with others. Those that don't work well together don't last very long.

title: Nurse Aid Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: Basic clinical questions. First apply online, then I received a call from the HR department to ask if I was interested in the available pier diem position. A few days later, I received an email from the hiring manager to set up an interview at the hospital. It was an one one interview with the nurse manager. A few days later, she called me to offer me the position,
Interview Questions: Where have you done your clinicals

title: Purchasing Agent Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: I am expected to interview with the hiring Manager and his superior.

title: Nurse Shift Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in Jan 2011
Interview Descriptions: First your nervous then after talking you feel comfortable and welcomed with appreciation. My background and experience were discussed and what I like to do for hobbies or in my spare
Interview Questions: Why are you choosing to apply what do you have to offer us

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center in May 2010
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was rather easy. I had one interview with HR and another with the hiring manager. The questions were straight forward and nothing difficult. HR and hiring manager were both nice and made me feel at ease.
Interview Questions: Questions were very straight forward and not very difficult.

title: Second Shift Coordinator/Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Milford Regional Medical Center (Milford, MA) in Jul 2009
Interview Descriptions: I was Hired right after completing my internship for Phlebotomy.
Interview Questions: Having to draw blood from the Lab manager.
